channel.title: Holistic Holidays
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcasts from Holistic Holidays in Lanzarote
channel.itunes:author: Holistic Holidays
channel.itunes:summary: Content from Holistic Holidays, a yoga-based theraputic retreat in Lanzarote, Canary Islands.
channel.description: Podcasts about the therapeutic, panoramic, relaxation retreat at Holistic Holidays in Lanzarote, where recuperating executives - mainly women - enjoy a yoga-based chill-out.
channel.itunes:keywords: yoga, breaks, detox, health, holidays, holistic, lanzarote, retreat, singles, spa, therapy

item.title: Interview 2: Stuart Forster & Lynne Oliver
item.description: The second in the series of Podcasts about the wellbeing holidays hosted at Villa Isis in Lanzarote, by Lynne Oliver and Stuart Forster of Holistic Holidays. Stuart and Lynne are interviewed by Iain Johnstone of the BBC about how they came to set up Holistic Holidays.
item.itunes:author: Holistic Holidays
item.itunes:subtitle: Stuart Forster & Lynne Oliver on setting up Holistic Holidays
item.itunes:summary: The second in the series of Podcasts about the wellbeing holidays hosted at Villa Isis in Lanzarote, by Lynne Oliver and Stuart Forster of Holistic Holidays. Stuart and Lynne are interviewed by Iain Johnstone of the BBC about how they came to set up Holistic Holidays.
item.itunes:keywords: yoga, breaks, detox, health, holidays, holistic, lanzarote, retreat, singles, spa, therapy

item.title: Interview 1: Lynne Oliver
item.description: The first of a series of Podcasts about the wellbeing holidays hosted at Villa Isis in Lanzarote by Lynne Oliver and Stuart Forster of Holistic Holidays. Lynne is interviewed by Iain Johnstone of the BBC about her Yoga philosophy and how so many guests have enjoyed the feelgood factor from her yoga classes.
item.itunes:author: Holistic Holidays
item.itunes:subtitle: Lynne Oliver on Yoga
item.itunes:summary: The first of a series of Podcasts about the wellbeing holidays hosted at Villa Isis in Lanzarote by Lynne Oliver and Stuart Forster of Holistic Holidays. Lynne is interviewed by Iain Johnstone of the BBC about her Yoga philosophy and how so many guests have enjoyed the feelgood factor from her yoga classes.
item.itunes:keywords: yoga, breaks, detox, health, holidays, holistic, lanzarote, retreat, singles, spa, therapy
